name: Portfolio Website
desc: Personal portfolio website showcasing skills and projects. Built using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and JSON, with responsive design and dynamic project gallery.

name: Flappy Bird Game
desc: A dynamic, browser-based game built using JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas. Features smooth animations, dynamic obstacles, and engaging gameplay.

name: Gym Fitness App
desc: A feature-packed Android app for fitness tracking. Includes workout plans, diet logs, and activity tracking, built using Java/Kotlin for a user-friendly experience.

name: Panda Virtual Assistant
desc: An AI-driven personal assistant, leveraging Natural Language Processing (NLP) to handle tasks like reminders, weather updates, and online searches.

name: Interior Design Website
desc: A visually captivating interior design website with a user-centric layout and interactive features, designed using JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.
